programmes.heading: Pain Management Program
programmes.paragraph: The Pain Management Program at 5 Sports Hospital offers personalized, evidence-based solutions to alleviate chronic and acute pain.

programmes.heading: Strength Enhancement Program
programmes.paragraph: Our Strength Enhancement Program is designed to boost physical performance, build muscular endurance, and improve overall strength.

programmes.heading: Athlete Development Program
programmes.paragraph: Our Athlete Development Program focuses on nurturing talent and enhancing performance through a structured approach to training, nutrition, and recovery.

programmes.heading: Individual Athlete Development Program
programmes.paragraph: The Individual Athlete Development Program offers personalized coaching tailored to each athlete's unique goals, strengths, and areas for improvement.

programmes.heading: Team Athlete Development Program
programmes.paragraph: The Team Athlete Development Program is designed to elevate overall team performance through coordinated training, skill development, and strategic conditioning.

programmes.heading: ACL Rehabilitation Package
programmes.paragraph: Comprehensive rehabilitation service for ACL, ankle, knee, hip, shoulder, and spinal surgery.

programmes.heading: Rehab Membership
programmes.paragraph: Access our facilities and staff daily for the best injury outcomes.

rehabilitation-program.title: Rehabilitation Programme
description: Specialist rehabilitation and support service for athletes and individuals recovering from injuries.

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: Tailored rehabilitation plans designed by experts to support recovery and performance.

pain-management.title: Pain Management Program
description: Personalized, evidence-based solutions to alleviate chronic and acute pain.

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: Combines advanced diagnostics, physical therapy, and minimally invasive techniques.

strength-enhancement.title: Strength Enhancement Program
description: Designed to boost physical performance and improve overall strength.

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: Combines resistance training, functional workouts, and expert guidance.

athlete-development.title: Athlete Development Program
description: Focuses on nurturing talent and enhancing performance.

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: Structured approach to training, nutrition, and recovery.

individual-athlete.title: Individual Athlete Development Program
description: Personalized coaching tailored to each athlete's unique goals.

team-athlete.title: Team Athlete Development Program
description: Elevates overall team performance through coordinated training.

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: Focuses on teamwork, communication, and sport-specific drills.

aclRehabPackage.title: ACL, ANKLE, KNEE, HIP, SHOULDER AND SPINAL SURGERY
description: We offer a comprehensive rehabilitation service from pre-surgery through to full recovery.
The same applies for those who are recovering from serious injury via the non-surgical route.

price.label: PRICE
price.value: £POA (ranging from single sessions through to a comprehensive package)

details.label: DETAILS
paragraphs: We work closely with surgeons and health providers to offer flexible, bespoke rehabilitation packages determined by the needs of each individual.
Our team have a particular specialism in ACL rehabilitation with years of experience in professional sport.
We recently recorded a podcast where Luke shared what to expect during the ACL recovery process.

rehabMembership.title: REHAB MEMBERSHIP
description: Access our facilities and staff on a daily basis to ensure the best possible injury outcomes.

details.label: DETAILS
items: Weekly soft tissue and manual therapy treatment
Weekly strength and conditioning sessions with our coaches
Daily access to GoPerform to conduct your rehabilitation
Use of all specialist equipment including AlterG, GameReady, Normatec, Compex and Altitude training

idealFor.label: IDEAL FOR
idealFor.description: Individuals looking to make a full return to sports participation and competition through a comprehensive support package.
